.. _sub-daijin:

Submodule: daijin
=================

.. automodule:: Mikado.daijin

hpc.yaml
~~~~~~~~

Example configuration file for scheduler information with DRMAA. File: :download:`hpc.yaml <hpc.yaml>`

mikado.snakefile
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

This file defines the Snakefile [Snake]_ of the pipeline for the stages regarding Mikado, ie after the assemblies have been performed. File: :download:`mikado.snakefile`.

tr.snakefile
~~~~~~~~~~~~
This file defines the Snakefile [Snake]_ of the pipeline for the stages read alignment and assembly, and for calling the reliable junctions with Portcullis. File: :download:`tr.snakefile`.
